5763.quoteText: Every time Yr gets weather data for your location, a third part (Akamai) will save this information and your IP-adress for 30 days
5763.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: Information is gathered about you through third parties

5764.quoteText: If you want your feedback to be deleted, send us a request or mention it in the contact form.<
5764.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service
